proposal: Understanding the importance of revolutionizing IP accessibility, IP.BOT is pioneering the first decentralized IP exchange. With 280 holders in the ETH network, your project is setting a new standard for secure and efficient internet connectivity. Our suite of B2B tools, including a customizable DEX and innovative lottery system, aligns perfectly with your vision, offering the community not just participation, but the power to deploy and benefit. Let's connect the dots for a more accessible internet.
